attributes.action: Hold the Tories accountable for their pledges made before the 2015 Election.
attributes.background: A democratic vote on whether to remain or leave Europe has just taken place. Chuka Umunna wants all the pledges made prior to the referendum to be made accountable for. The present Government should then also respond to all of their pledges and explain how they have been adhered to.

rejection.details:
We're not sure what you mean by "hold the Tories accountable". If you want the law to change so that manifesto promises are legally binding, you might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/125677
